ValidationRule.description: If the escalation reason is "Other" please specify it
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
RecordTypeId = '0128F000000W684QAC', /*Technical Support*/ OR( $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Manager", $UserRole.Name = "Technical Support Rep" ),
ISPICKVAL( T2_Escalation_Process_Reason__c, "Other"),
(ISBLANK( T2_Escalation_Reason_Other__c)), RecordType.Name = "Technical Support" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If T2 Escalation Reason=Other, then 'T2 Escalation Reason Other' field is required to be filled in
